A

Account - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a bank account with an account number and balance.
Account(String, Amount) - Constructor for class Account
Constructs a new Account with the specified account number and initial balance.
Amount - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a monetary amount using a BigDecimal.
Amount(BigDecimal) - Constructor for class Amount
Constructs a new Amount with the specified BigDecimal value.

C

credit(Amount) - Method in class Account
Credits the specified amount to the account.

D

debit(Amount) - Method in class Account
Debits the specified amount from the account.

G

Gets the account number associated with this account.
getAmount() - Method in class Amount
Gets the BigDecimal value of the monetary amount.
getBalance() - Method in class Account
Gets the current balance of the account.

I
